articles.title: Black Don't Crack? The Truth About Sunscreen and Mature Melanated Skin
articles.excerpt: For years, many of us believed deeper skin tones didn't need sunscreen. But while melanin protects, it doesn't make us immune. Discover why SPF is essential for mature melanated skin, and how it pairs with NFE's Layered Care philosophy.
